name: Moms with Voices Media
overview:
Moms with Voices Media is a social network of hundreds of family oriented and mom bloggers.

We believe in the power of networking. We support our bloggers to help them make develop and monetize their blogs, while giving businesses a way of reaching a mass audience. We connect business with bloggers

For advertisers, we provide a highly targeted medium to promote your business. Blog campaigns work. We take them to the next level by combining them with social media, and through our network get your product or service out to the masses.

We offer our bloggers access to our own affiliate ad network with great payouts and targeted ads. Along with a vast library of tips, how-to’s and advice, and a tight knit community offering support, together, we are a driving force
